result.title: Problem on centroid decomposition
result.content:
Given a weighted tree with N nodes, find the minimum number of edges in a path of length K, or return -1 if such a path does not exist.
1 <= N <= 200000
1 <= length(i;j) <= 1000000 (integer weights)
1 <= K <= 1000000 .
I read somewhere that this can be solved using centroid decomposition but not know how . So please help .
Thanks in advance.
